justification: The 737-NG Customer Experience project reconfigures the interior of the 122 Boeing 737-NG (800) aircraft to install the Panasonic eX1 IFE system. The LiveTV Passenger Entertainment System is currently installed on the 218 Boeing 737-NG aircraft. This Engineering Authorization (EA) will remove the LiveTV IFE system from the 122 800 series 737 aircraft.
impact: For the Flight Training devices, this EA will remove the overhead IFE switch and 3 circuit breakers from the P6-1 panel, along with one circuit breaker from the P6-4 panel.
parts_json: [{"part":"MS24658-23D","desc":"IFE Power Switch","type":"Remove","qty":"1"},{"part":"N40001-145","desc":"IFE POWER ON OFF placard","type":"Remove","qty":"1"},{"part":"NSA939511-03","desc":"Plug","type":"Add","qty":"2"},{"part":"N40001-143","desc":"Placard","type":"Remove","qty":"1"},{"part":"PS387054.10","desc":"Circuit Breakers IFE AC POWER 1, IFE AC POWER 2 (P6-1 B12, B15)","type":"Remove","qty":"2"},{"part":"PS387054.06","desc":"Circuit Breaker IFE DC CONTROL (P6-1 B17)","type":"Remove","qty":"1"},{"part":"NSA939511-03","desc":"Plug","type":"Add","qty":"3"},{"part":"N40001-457","desc":"Label Cover","type":"Add","qty":"1"},{"part":"N40001-065","desc":"Placard","type":"Remove","qty":"1"},{"part":"PS387054.08","desc":"Circuit Breaker IFE DC BUS (P6-4 B12)","type":"Remove","qty":"1"}]
instructions_json:
[{"instruction":"

P5 PILOT OVERHEAD PANEL (Reference Thales dwg 188139 SH 5, Detail H.)

  • Remove IFE Power Switch P/N MS24658-23D (S9624) from the Cockpit Switch Panel.
  • Remove Placard 'IFE POWER ON OFF' P/N N40001-145 from the P5 panel, and discard locally.
  • Install Plug (P/N NSA939511-03). Inside the P5 panel, remove Placard P/N N40001-143 (S9624) and discard locally.
","notes":""},{"instruction":"

P6-1 PANEL  (Reference dwg 368911-020/021)

Unwrap daisy-chained wires from (circuit breakers located at):

  • B7-1 to B12-1
  • B12-1 to B15-1
  • B15-1 to B17-1

Unwrap daisy-chained wires from (circuit breakers located at):

  • A12-2 to B12-2
  • A15-2 to B15-2
  • B15-2 to C15-2
  • A17-2 to B17-2
  • B17-2 to C17-2

Add wirewrap wires from (circuit breakers located at):

  • A15-2 to C15-2
  • A17-2 to C17-2
","notes":""},{"instruction":"

P6-1 PANEL (Thales Drawing 188139 SH 5, Detail F)

  • Remove quantity 2 circuit breaker, P/N PS387054.10, (IFE AC POWER 1, IFE AC POWER 2).
  • Remove quantity 1 circuit breaker, P/N PS387054.06, (IFE DC CONTROL). 
  • Install three (3) plugs (P/N NSA939511-03) and three (3) Label Cover (P/N N40001-457) at locations where circuit breakers were removed.
","notes":""},{"instruction":"

P6-4 PANEL (Reference dwg 368911-035/036)

Unwrap daisy-chained wires from (circuit breakers located at):

  • B11-1 to B12-1
  • B12-1 to B14-1 

Add wirewrap from B11-1 to B14-1. 

Unwrap daisy-chained wires from (circuit breakers located at):

  • A1J1-47 to B12-2
  • B12-2 to C12-2 

Add wirewrap from A1J1-47 to C12-2.

","notes":""},{"instruction":"

P6-4 PANEL (Reference dwg Thales Drawing 188139 SH 5, Detail G)

  • Remove Circuit Breaker(B12) P/N PS387054.08 (IFE DC BUS).
  • Install Plug (P/N NSA939511-03) and Label Cover (P/N N40001-457).
  • Inside P6-4 panel, remove placard, C9203 (P/N N40001-065) and discard.
","notes":""},{"instruction":"

Ensure the work area is clean and clear of tools and debris.

","notes":""},{"instruction":"

Ensure the work area is clean and clear of tools and debris.

","notes":""}]
